Data Fields
qei_attr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Quadrature Encoder Interface (QEI)

QEI IO Attributes. More...

#include <qei.h>

Detailed Description

This structure defines how the control structure for opening or reconfiguring the QEI port.

Data Fields

u32 o_flags
 
qei_pin_assignment_t pin_assignment
 
u32 top

u32 velocity_comp
 
u32 filter
 

Field Documentation

u32 qei_attr_t::filter

The filter coefficient (0 to disable)

u32 qei_attr_t::max_position

The maximum position (QEI rolls over at this point)

u32 qei_attr_t::o_flags

Flag bitmask

qei_pin_assignment_t qei_attr_t::pin_assignment

Pin assignment

u32 qei_attr_t::top

Maximum value

u32 qei_attr_t::velocity_comp

The Velocity compare value
